title: Cyber security firm Artic Wolf opens first India GCC in Bengaluru
description: The US-based firm plans to recruit 150 employees by mid-2025, especially in roles related to core R&D areas like threat intelligence and artificial intelligence (AI).
content: US-based cyber security firm, Arctic Wolf Tuesday announced the launch of its first Indian Global Capability Centre (GCC) in Bengaluru. The US-based firm plans to recruit 150 employees by mid-2025, especially in roles related to core R&D areas like threat intelligence and artificial intelligence (AI).
